nodes.bodyText: A new logger member should be created in this class belonging to the same - using logger from AbstractRuntimeManager might lead to confusion in logs, and might not be displayed in case a different logger level is set for that class.
I think this should be kept as it was - logger for PerRequestRuntimeManager should be created in its own class and not inherit this to avoid any issues when configuring logging.
Kept it back to the previous qualifier, thanks
